snippet.title: Best Forklift Operator - Teaser Trailer (Steam, 2022)
snippet.description:
👷 STEAM 👷 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684670/

Experience what the job of a forklift operator looks like, participate in the training and show that you are ready for the challenges. Complete tasks fast and precisely, earn money and become the ruler of warehouses, yards, loading and unloading. 

Best Forklift Operator offers Career mode, Arcade Mode, Training and Free Roam mode. You can run all this on a flat screen, playing on a keyboard and mouse or gamepad, or put the VR headset on and enjoy even more immersion in virtual reality!

Add Best Forklift Operator to your Steam wishlist today and stay up to date on this project: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684670/Best_Forklift_Operator/

Check out our channels:
💬【𝙳𝙸𝚂𝙲𝙾𝚁𝙳】https://discord.gg/ZUQfuxgjru
📰【𝙵𝙰𝙲𝙴𝙱𝙾𝙾𝙺】https://www.facebook.com/Gamedust
🦆【𝚃𝚆𝙸𝚃𝚃𝙴𝚁】https://twitter.com/GamedustTT
🕹️【𝚂𝚃𝙴𝙰𝙼】https://store.steampowered.com/dev/GameDust
📷【𝙸𝙽𝚂𝚃𝙰𝙶𝚁𝙰𝙼】https://www.instagram.com/gamedust_studio/
